clues.text: Royal Festival Hall is part of the South Bank Centre, an arts complex on the south bank of this river

rounds.comments: (Alex: We've featured POTPOURRI.  Today we feature [*], with "H-O" in quotation marks.  Those two letters will appear in each correct response.)

clues.text: A square dance, or the kind of party where you dance it
